TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TaskbarItemInfo extends System.Windows.Freezable
Public NotInheritable Class TaskbarItemInfo Inherits Freezable
public ref class TaskbarItemInfo sealed : System::Windows::Freezable

summary.span: 表示工作列縮圖顯示方式的相關資訊。

span.span: Represents information about how the taskbar thumbnail is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的 managed 包裝函式[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列功能。The class provides a managed wrapper for [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar functionality. 如需 Windows shell 和原生工作列應用程式開發介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作列延伸](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479)。For more information about the Windows shell and native taskbar APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479). 會公開為上的相依性屬性。 is exposed as the dependency property on a . [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列可提供增強的功能，可讓您使用工作列項目來傳達給使用者的狀態，和最小化或隱藏視窗時，公開一般工作。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar item to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. 所公開的功能類別是無法在 Windows 的版本比使用[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The functionality that is exposed by the class is unavailable in versions of Windows earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 使用應用程式類別仍然可以執行舊版 Windows 中; 不過，這些工作列增強功能是在較早的版本中無法使用。Applications that use the class can still run in earlier versions of Windows; however, these taskbar enhancements are unavailable in the earlier versions. 在[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]，有些工作列功能可能無法使用，視使用者的設定而定。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], some taskbar functionality might be unavailable, depending on the user's settings. 比方說，是無法使用工作列功能如果[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)]會停用，或如果以更高權限啟動應用程式。For example, taskbar functionality is unavailable if [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] is disabled or if the application is started with elevated permissions. 您的應用程式應該提供其他方式與使用者互動，而不必中的增強型的工作列功能[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。Your application should provide other ways to interact with the user that do not depend on the enhanced taskbar functionality in [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 程式圖示，在通知區域中，是在工作列最右邊，通常用來傳達給使用者的應用程式狀態。Program icons in the notification area, which is at the far right of the taskbar, are typically used to communicate application status to a user. 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列隱藏通知區域中的程式圖示。By default, the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar hides program icons in the notification area. 不過，您可以設定屬性新增至工作列按鈕狀態，例如線上的狀態訊息的應用程式中的映像。However, you can set the property to add an image to the taskbar button to communicate status, such as online status in a messaging application. 將重疊影像可讓使用者看到的應用程式狀態，即使無法查看通知區域中的程式圖示。The overlay image lets users see the application status even if they cannot see the program icon in the notification area. 您也可以顯示進度的工作列按鈕中執行工作，藉由設定和屬性。You can also display the progress of running tasks in the taskbar button by setting the and properties. [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列顯示縮圖的應用程式，當您移動滑鼠指標移至工作列按鈕時。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar displays a thumbnail of the application when you move the mouse pointer over the taskbar button. 依預設會顯示整個應用程式視窗。By default the whole application window is shown. 您可以指定特定部分的視窗，以顯示縮圖中，藉由設定屬性。You can specify a particular part of the window to display in the thumbnail by setting the property. 您也可以指定工作列縮圖上方的工具提示中所顯示。You can also specify a that is displayed in a tooltip above the taskbar thumbnail. 當因為使用者設定而無法看到縮圖，就會顯示工具提示。The tooltip is displayed even when the thumbnail cannot be seen because of user settings. 您可以提供一般工作的存取權，不需要切換至應用程式視窗的工作列縮圖中加入按鈕。You can add buttons to the taskbar thumbnail to provide access to common tasks without switching to the application window. 例如，視窗 Media Player 提供播放、 暫停，以及上一步 按鈕，可讓您控制從工作列縮圖的播放媒體，最小化應用程式時。For example, Window Media Player provides Play, Pause, Forward, and Back buttons that let you control media playback from the taskbar thumbnail when the application is minimized. 工作列縮圖中的按鈕都由物件且包含在集合。Buttons in the taskbar thumbnail are represented by objects and are contained in the collection. 下圖顯示的增強的功能[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列。The following illustration shows the enhanced features of the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar. ![工作列項目資訊範例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "工作列項目資訊範例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 工作列增強功能Windows Taskbar Enhanced Features ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立標記中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 包含的集合物件可讓您存取播放和停止命令從工作列項目。The contains a collection of objects that provide access to the Play and Stop commands from the taskbar item. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#010)] 下列標記和程式碼顯示上述範例中其完整內容。The following markup and code shows the previous example in its full context. 應用程式使用來計算從 0 到 100 之間，並在使用者介面中顯示其進度。The application uses a to count from 0 to 100 and displays its progress in the user interface. 工作可以啟動並停止從工作列預覽。The task can be started and stopped from the taskbar preview. 進度會顯示在工作列按鈕。The progress is displayed in the taskbar button. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#001)] [!code-csharp[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#100)]

public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定工作列項目工具提示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text for the taskbar item tooltip.

value.span: 工作列項目工具提示的文字。

span.span: The text for the taskbar item tooltip.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當滑鼠指標位於工作列按鈕上時，工具提示會顯示工作列縮圖上方。The tooltip is displayed above the taskbar thumbnail when the mouse pointer is over the taskbar button. 如果因為使用者設定而未顯示工作列縮圖，仍會顯示工具提示。If the taskbar thumbnail is not displayed because of user settings, the tooltip is still displayed. 下圖顯示工作列工具提示。The following illustration shows the taskbar tooltip. ![工作列項目資訊範例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "工作列項目資訊範例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 工作列描述Windows Taskbar Description ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的標記，以及組屬性。The following example shows how to create a in markup and set the property. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#010)]

Public Shared ReadOnly DescriptionProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::ImageSource ^ Overlay { System::Windows::Media::ImageSource ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::ImageSource ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在工作列按鈕中的程式圖示上顯示的影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed over the program icon in the taskbar button.

value.span: 在工作列按鈕中的程式圖示上顯示的影像。

span.span: The image that is displayed over the program icon in the taskbar button.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將影像加入至傳達給使用者的應用程式狀態的工作列按鈕的程式圖示。You can add an image to the program icon in the taskbar button to communicate application status to the user. 重疊會使用靜態或以動畫顯示，位於右下角的工作列按鈕的圖示。The overlay uses a static or animated that is positioned over the bottom-right corner of the icon in the taskbar button. 如果使用者設定以顯示小圖示工作列，不會顯示重疊。The overlay is not displayed if the user sets the taskbar to show small icons. 程式圖示，在通知區域中，是在工作列最右邊，通常用來傳達給使用者的應用程式狀態。Program icons in the notification area, which is at the far right of the taskbar, are typically used to communicate application status to a user. 在[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]，通知區域中的程式圖示依預設，會隱藏，因此，小於適用於通訊的狀態。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], program icons in the notification area are hidden by default, and are therefore, less useful for communicating status. 您可以使用中的工作列按鈕覆疊[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]隱藏通知區域中的圖示時，通訊狀態。You can use the taskbar button overlay in [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] to communicate status when the icon in the notification area is hidden. 您的應用程式可以偵測的 Windows 版本，並提供適用於作業系統的方式通知。Your application can detect the version of Windows and provide notifications in a manner that is appropriate for the operating system. 在適當的大小會轉譯重疊影像。Overlay images are rendered at the appropriate size. 如果代表，也會使用適當的位元深度。If the represents an , the appropriate bit depth is also used. 下圖顯示工作列。The following illustration shows the taskbar . ![工作列項目資訊範例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "工作列項目資訊範例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 工作列覆疊Windows Taskbar Overlay ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的標記，以及組屬性。The following example shows how to create a in markup and set the property. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#010)] 下列範例示範如何利用程式碼設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property in code. [!code-csharp[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#121](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#121)] [!code-vb[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#121](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#121)]

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Shell::TaskbarItemProgressState ProgressState { System::Windows::Shell::TaskbarItemProgressState get(); void set(System::Windows::Shell::TaskbarItemProgressState value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示進度列指示器顯示在工作列按鈕中的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the progress indicator is displayed in the taskbar button.

value.span: 列舉值，這個值表示進度列指示器顯示在工作列按鈕中的方式。

span.span: An enumeration value that indicates how the progress indicator is displayed in the taskbar button.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由顯示進度列指示器中的通訊的長時間執行的工作進度[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列按鈕。You can communicate the progress of long-running tasks by displaying a progress indicator in a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar button. 指標的色彩由屬性，其中包含的其中一個列舉值。The color of the indicator is determined by the property, which contains one of the enumeration values. 當是，指標為綠色。When the is , the indicator is green. 當，指標為黃色。When , the indicator is yellow. 當，指標是紅色。When , the indicator is red. 這兩種狀態，如屬性會決定多少的工作列按鈕會填入進度列指示器。For these states, the property determines how much of the taskbar button is filled by the progress indicator. 其他值都會忽略。 is ignored for other values of . 顯示整個工作列按鈕推進綠色指示器。 shows a pulsing green indicator across the entire taskbar button. 會顯示任何指標。No indicator is shown for . 下圖顯示在工作列進度列指示器狀態。The following illustration shows the taskbar progress indicator in the state. ![工作列項目資訊範例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "工作列項目資訊範例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 工作列進度列指示器Windows Taskbar Progress Indicator ## Examples 下列範例示範如何利用程式碼設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property in code. 處理常式中設定的狀態是事件用來指出使用者是否已停止的背景工作結束但發生錯誤，或正常完成。The state is set in the handler of a event to indicate whether the background task was stopped by the user, ended with an error, or completed normally. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#120)] [!code-vb[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#120)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示進度列指示器在工作列按鈕中的飽和度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the fullness of the progress indicator in the taskbar button.

value.span: 值，這個值表示進度列指示器在工作列按鈕中的飽和度。

span.span: A value that indicates the fullness of the progress indicator in the taskbar button.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性以 0.0 到 1.0 之間的值。The property is represented as a value between 0.0 and 1.0. 小、 較大的數字會強制這些範圍內。Numbers smaller and larger are coerced to be within those bounds. 會強制轉型為 0。 is coerced to 0. 您可以藉由顯示進度列指示器中的通訊的長時間執行的工作進度[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列按鈕。You can communicate the progress of long-running tasks by displaying a progress indicator in a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar button. 指標的色彩由屬性，其中包含的其中一個列舉值。The color of the indicator is determined by the property, which contains one of the enumeration values. 如果屬性是， ，或、屬性會決定進度列指示器的飽和度。If the property is , , or , the property determines the fullness of the progress indicator. 某些值都會忽略。 is ignored for some values of . 顯示整個工作列按鈕推進綠色指示器。 shows a pulsing green indicator across the entire taskbar button. 會顯示任何指標。No indicator is shown for . 下圖顯示工作列進度列指示器與的 82%。The following illustration shows the taskbar progress indicator with a of 82 percent. ![工作列項目資訊範例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "工作列項目資訊範例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 工作列進度列指示器Windows Taskbar Progress Indicator ## Examples 下列範例示範如何利用程式碼設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property in code. 處理常式中設定值，則事件，代表目前的背景工作的進度。The value is set in the handler of a event to indicate the current progress of the background task. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#130)] [!code-vb[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#130)]

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Shell::ThumbButtonInfoCollection ^ ThumbButtonInfos { System::Windows::Shell::ThumbButtonInfoCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Shell::ThumbButtonInfoCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 相關聯之 物件的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of objects that are associated with the .

value.span: 與 相關聯之 物件的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects that are associated with the .
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將按鈕加入至提供一般工作的使用者可存取，而不需要它們來切換至應用程式視窗的工作列縮圖。You can add buttons to the taskbar thumbnail to give users access to common tasks without requiring them to switch to the application window. 例如，Windows Media Player 會提供應用程式最小化時，可讓使用者控制播放媒體從工作列縮圖的播放、 暫停、 轉寄、 及上一步 按鈕。For example, Windows Media Player provides Play, Pause, Forward, and Back buttons that let users control media playback from the taskbar thumbnail when the application is minimized. 工作列縮圖中的按鈕都由物件且包含在集合。Buttons in the taskbar thumbnail are represented by objects and are contained in the collection. [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]殼層工作列縮圖中允許最多七個按鈕。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] shell allows a maximum of seven buttons in the taskbar thumbnail. 如果超過七物件加入至，其他的物件會被視為溢位。If more than seven objects are added to the , the additional objects are treated as overflow. 當按鈕是它並沒有任何可見的項目，它會保留任何空間。When a button is , it does not have any visible elements, and no space is reserved for it. 在這種情況下，其他的按鈕，從溢位會顯示。In this case, additional buttons from the overflow are displayed. 下圖顯示工作列預覽，具有兩個捲動方塊按鈕的集合。The following illustration shows the taskbar preview with a collection of two thumb buttons. ![工作列項目資訊範例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "工作列項目資訊範例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 工作列捲動方塊按鈕Windows Taskbar Thumb Buttons ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立標記中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 包含的集合物件可讓您存取播放和停止命令從工作列項目。The contains a collection of objects that provide access to the Play and Stop commands from the taskbar item. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#010)]

Public Shared ReadOnly ThumbButtonInfosProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness ThumbnailClipMargin { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定應用程式視窗的工作區會顯示在工作列縮圖中的部分。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the part of the application window's client area that is displayed in the taskbar thumbnail.

value.span: 一個值，指定應用程式視窗的工作區會顯示在工作列縮圖中的部分。

span.span: A value that specifies the part of the application window's client area that is displayed in the taskbar thumbnail.
The default is an empty .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列顯示應用程式視窗的工作區的縮放縮圖。By default, the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar displays a scaled thumbnail of an application window's client area. 您可以設定屬性來指定用戶端視窗顯示縮圖中的裁剪的區域。You can set the property to specify a cropped area of the client window that is displayed in the thumbnail. 例如，這個屬性是如果您想要專注於視窗內容的縮圖，排除應用程式工具列時很有用。For example, this property is useful if you want to focus the thumbnail on the window content while you exclude the application toolbars. 這個屬性不能用於在看不到應用程式視窗中的縮圖中顯示內容。This property cannot be used to display content in the thumbnail that is not already visible in the application window. 指定藉由設定顯示縮圖中的區域區域周圍的框線。You specify the area that is displayed in the thumbnail by setting the of the border around the area. 框線會從用戶端視窗的邊緣，然後向內擴充，以指定的數量。The border starts at the edge of the client window and extends inward by the specified amount. 在框線內部的內容會顯示在縮圖。Content inside the border is displayed in the thumbnail. 下圖顯示定義的框線。The following illustration shows the borders that define the . ![縮圖裁剪邊界](~/add/media/wpfshell-clipmargin.png "縮圖裁剪邊界")![Thumbnail clip margin](~/add/media/wpfshell-clipmargin.png "Thumbnail clip margin") 縮圖裁剪邊界框線Thumbnail Clip Margin Border 下圖顯示裁剪的縮圖預覽。The following illustration shows the clipped thumbnail preview. ![工作列項目資訊範例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "工作列項目資訊範例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 工作列縮圖預覽Windows Taskbar Thumbnail Preview ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的標記，以及組屬性。The following example shows how to create a in markup and set the property. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#010)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty ThumbnailClipMarginProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly ThumbnailClipMarginProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
